creditline: Gift of Ruth and Bruce Dayton
description: one of a set of 12 hanging scrolls; the first and twelfth scrolls have three lines and partial images of plants; ten scrolls have images of various plant life and birds
markings: length of left side three columns of undeciphered text; ULC of image one column of undeciphered text with two stamps
medium: ink and color on paper, hanging scroll
title: Bird and Flower
